column5: Additional intakes: 26 Feb ’24 and 20 May ‘24Programme start date: February, May, SeptemberIn the UK, we have seen a huge expansion in artificial intelligence (AI) during the last decade, showcasing that the UK economy is aiming to use AI to position itself at the forefront of the revolution. Data shows that the AI sector is worth over £15.6bn and employs more than 35,000 people. This means that AI has rapidly become a medium-sized sector in the UK economy and has the potential to participate in other sectors’ growth.
column7: Please see our webpage for further information.
